Articles.Content:
Hey so I'm working on an IVA for a cockpit, but when I go to add props for RasterPropMonitor I get funky looking screens/displays and some of the other props don't work (navball, speed LCD, Indicator panel, B9 action group switches, etc).

Any idea what causes this? 

Example:

![DtYi03W.png](http://i.imgur.com/DtYi03W.png)

Mods I am using (not many). QuizTech mods are mine and contain no plugins.

![YItIPY6.png](http://i.imgur.com/YItIPY6.png)

Did you get the JSI for .90 if thats what you are using ? I don't use B9 so not sure how there RPM's tie in but most the time it's just files in the wrong place, What does your log say ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T23:49:50Z" title="03/07/2015 11:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

> 
> Did you get the JSI for .90 if thats what you are using ? I don't use B9 so not sure how there RPM's tie in but must the time it's just files in the wrong place, What does your log say ?

Ah, I just looked back on the RPM thread and I had missed the link at the top to the .90 files. I will try them out and see!

Hope that will fix you up and love your mods great job !

EDIT- ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T23:50:38Z" title="03/07/2015 11:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

> 
> Hope that will fix you up and love your mods great job !

Yes it did, thanks a bunch!

![vJVa2ILh.png](http://i.imgur.com/vJVa2ILh.png)

(HUD is backwards but that is an easy fix lol)

EDIT: Hmm but it looks like the middle and right MFD's are not responding to the button clicks..

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-08T01:07:40Z" title="03/08/2015 01:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 8, 2015</time> by Quiznos323**
